snippet: Super League Gaming, a new after-school league for children 7 to 14, treats video games like soccer.
abstract: Competitive video gaming has become so popular there are now after-school leagues for children that treat video games like athletic sport.
lead_paragraph: Super League Gaming, a new after-school league for children 7 to 14, treats video games like soccer.

headline.print_headline: For Gamers, a League of Their Own
headline.main: Gamers Have a Little League of Their Own
